toy.title: Toy List

qrcode.title: Qrcode Generator
qrcode.description: QR code generation tool that provides multiple configuration parameters and error correction levels.

minesweeper.title: MineSweeper
minesweeper.description: Minesweeper game with three levels: beginner, intermediate and expert.

image.title: Image Compressor
image.description: Image compression tool that compresses images by modifying their quality or size, and provides a comparison function between before and after compression.

color.title: Color Converter
color.description: Color value conversion tool, providing RGB, HSL, HSV conversion as well as RGB hexadecimal and decimal conversion functions, and color contrast calculation function.
